duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain the client's Salesforce/Affinaquest CRM system.
Create user accounts, maintain Advancement databases, and train staff on effective use of Salesforce products.
Partner with Sr. Director of Advancement Services to implement Salesforce/Affinquest CRM System and provide suggestions for technology enhancements.
Maintain knowledge of the University's enterprise system and participate in cross‐functional teams to address strategic business issues involving CRM.
Develop and maintain documentation regarding CRM configuration, business processes, and rules.
Ensure optimal performance of Salesforce systems and products.
Upgrade and configure Salesforce systems for optimized integration, manage Salesforce roles, profiles, sharing rules, workflows, and groups.
Import sales department leads, contacts, and other data, maintain the sales cloud, and build custom reports and dashboards.
Perform database maintenance tasks, including diagnostic tests and duplicate entry cleansing, evaluate and install new Salesforce releases, and provide training and support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field preferred
